flixel.animation.FlxAnimationController

type
class

Constructor

new(Sprite : flixel.FlxSprite)

Instance Variables

callback : String -> Int -> Int -> Void

If assigned, will be called each time the current frame changes. A function that has 3 parameters: a string name, a frame number, and a frame index.

curAnim(accessor,accessor) : FlxAnimation

Property access for currently playing FlxAnimation (warning: can be null).

finished(accessor,accessor) : Bool

Returns whether an _animations is finished playing.

frameIndex(default,accessor) : Int

metadata
:isVar
Tell the sprite to change to a specific frame of the _curAnim.

frameName(accessor,accessor) : String

Tell the sprite to change to a frame with specific name. Useful for sprites with loaded TexturePacker atlas.

frames(accessor,null) : Int

The total number of frames in this image. WARNING: assumes each row in the sprite sheet is full!

name(accessor,accessor) : String

Gets or sets the currently playing _animations (warning: can be null).

paused(accessor,accessor) : Bool

Pause & resume _curAnim.

Instance Methods

add(Name : String, Frames : Array<Int>, ?FrameRate : Int, ?Looped : Bool) : Void

parameters
Name What this animation should be called (e.g. "run").
Frames An array of numbers indicating what frames to play in what order (e.g. 1, 2, 3).
FrameRate The speed in frames per second that the _animations should play at (e.g. 40 fps).
Looped Whether or not the _animations is looped or just plays once.
Adds a new _animations to the sprite.

addByIndicies(Name : String, Prefix : String, Indicies : Array<Int>, Postfix : String, ?FrameRate : Int, ?Looped : Bool) : Void

parameters
Name What this _animations should be called (e.g. "run").
Prefix Common beginning of image names in atlas (e.g. "tiles-")
Indicies An array of numbers indicating what frames to play in what order (e.g. 1, 2, 3).
Postfix Common ending of image names in atlas (e.g. ".png")
FrameRate The speed in frames per second that the _animations should play at (e.g. 40 fps).
Looped Whether or not the _animations is looped or just plays once.
Adds a new _animations to the sprite.

addByNames(Name : String, FrameNames : Array<String>, ?FrameRate : Int, ?Looped : Bool) : Void

parameters
Name What this _animations should be called (e.g. "run").
FrameNames An array of image names from atlas indicating what frames to play in what order.
FrameRate The speed in frames per second that the _animations should play at (e.g. 40 fps).
Looped Whether or not the _animations is looped or just plays once.
Adds a new _animations to the sprite.

addByPrefix(Name : String, Prefix : String, ?FrameRate : Int, ?Looped : Bool) : Void

parameters
Name What this _animations should be called (e.g. "run").
Prefix Common beginning of image names in atlas (e.g. "tiles-")
FrameRate The speed in frames per second that the _animations should play at (e.g. 40 fps).
Looped Whether or not the _animations is looped or just plays once.
Adds a new _animations to the sprite.

addByStringIndicies(Name : String, Prefix : String, Indicies : Array<String>, Postfix : String, ?FrameRate : Int, ?Looped : Bool) : Void

parameters
Name What this _animations should be called (e.g. "run").
Prefix Common beginning of image names in atlas (e.g. "tiles-")
Indicies An array of strings indicating what frames to play in what order (e.g. ["01", "02", "03"]).
Postfix Common ending of image names in atlas (e.g. ".png")
FrameRate The speed in frames per second that the _animations should play at (e.g. 40 fps).
Looped Whether or not the _animations is looped or just plays once.
Adds a new _animations to the sprite. Should works a little bit faster than addByIndicies()

copyFrom(controller : FlxAnimationController) : FlxAnimationController

createPrerotated(?Controller : FlxAnimationController) : Void

destroy() : Void

destroyAnimations() : Void

get(Name : String) : FlxAnimation

parameters
Name The name of the animation.
returns
Animation FlxAnimation object with the specified name.
Gets an animation by name

inline getByName(Name : String) : FlxAnimation

Gets the FlxAnim object with the specified name.

inline getFrameIndex(Frame : flixel.system.layer.frames.FlxFrame) : Int

parameters
Frame FlxFrame to find
returns
position of specified FlxFrame object.
Helper function used for finding index of FlxFrame in _framesData's frames array

inline pause() : Void

Pauses current _animations

play(AnimName : String, ?Force : Bool, ?Frame : Int) : Void

parameters
AnimName The string name of the _animations you want to play.
Force Whether to force the _animations to restart.
Frame The frame number in _animations you want to start from (0 by default). If you pass negative value then it will start from random frame
Plays an existing _animations (e.g. "run"). If you call an _animations that is already playing it will be ignored.

randomFrame() : Void

Tell the sprite to change to a random frame of _animations Useful for instantiating particles or other weird things.

inline resume() : Void

Resumes current _animations if it's exist

update() : Void
